news.title: Castle Wars Update 1.2 Coming Soon!
content: Get ready for our biggest update yet! Castle Wars 1.2 brings new levels, and a completely revamped combat system that will change the way you play.

features.title: Update 1.2:
items: 5 New Levels: Explore new castles and battlefields.
Revamped AI System: Experience more dynamic and strategic battles.

news.footer: The update is scheduled for release on November 1st!
